full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,TSAD MA KUN LAS BTUS PA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @017A *, ,TSAD MA KUN LAS BTUS PA ZHES BYA BA'I RAB TU BYED PA, ,SLOB DPON PHYOGS KYI GLANG POS MDZAD PA RDZOGS SO,, ,,RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO RIGS PA SMRA BA'I GTZUG GI NOR BUR GRAGS PA PA SUDHA RA RAKshI TA DANG; ;BOD KYI LOTZTSA PA DGE BSNYEN SENG RGYAL GYIS BSGYUR CING ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB PA'O,, ,,AOm SVA STI, ,GSUNG RAB KUN GYI RIGS GNAD BSDUS, ,RTZOM TSE NGO MTSAR BRTAGS MANG BYUNG, ,'JAM PA'I DBYANGS KYIS LEGS BSKUL BA'I, , NGO MTSAR TSAD MA KUN BTUS LA, ,DUS NGAN SNYIGS MA'I MTHA' KHOB TU, ,SLOB GNYER BYED MKHAN MED MA ZAD, ,SLOB GNYER DGOS PA'I GTAM TZAM MED, ,DPE YANG SHIN TU RNYED DKA' BAS, ,THA NA DPE RGYAS CI MA RUNG, ,SNYAM DU SMON PA'I YID BSKUL NAS, ,DKA' BCU BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS DANG, ,DGE BSNYEN TSANGS PA GNYIS PO YIS, ,PAR BSGRUBS RNAM DKAR DGE BA'I MTHUS, ,'GRO KUN RTEN BZANG RIM BRGYUD DE, ,SANGS RGYAS GO 'PHANG MYUR 'THOB SHOG ,KHYAD PAR BSTAN 'DZIN ZHABS PAD BRTAN, ,'GAL RKYEN KUN SEL MTHUN RKYEN BSGRUBS, ,BSTAN PA YUN RING GNAS 'GYUR CIG ,CES PA 'DI NI DKA' BCU BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYIS BRIS PA'O,, ,,
